project.name: bsd
project.description: Porting of Gentoo facilities on BSD systems
project.longdescription:
An effort to provide the complete Gentoo/Linux facilities on BSD operating systems, allowing users to use their knowledege of Gentoo's services and utilites with BSD userlands and kernels.
This project is still in its infancy. If you are interested in working on it, please send an e-mail to the Gentoo/*BSD team.
project.resource: Notes for Developers of Gentoo/*BSD ports
project.plannedproject: This is a (still unofficial) port of Gentoo under DragonFly BSD system. Quite near to Gentoo/FreeBSD, this port will share many part of the current implementation. Developed by Robert Sebastian Gerus (arachnist).

body.p: Ways to contact Gentoo/*BSD developers include the IRC Channel #gentoo-bsd on Freenode, as well as the mailing list gentoo-bsd@gentoo.org. To subscribe just send an empty email to gentoo-bsd-subscribe@gentoo.org and follow the instructions included in the reply.
